attributes.action: make it illegal for any UK taxpayer pounds to be used by political activitists, in any form, for the purpose of promoting themselves or their political parties to gain election into Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is an ever increasing amount of evidence that politicians consider money taken from the working population of this country in ever increasing numbers of stealth taxes as their own.  Because of that it is imperative that politicians should NEVER be allowed to use taxpayer pounds to promote themselves nor their party, under any circumstances.
